title: Starfield in Processing
description: This is the first in a new series of videos. In this video I attempt to program a "star field" or "warp speed" visualization in Processing.

timestamps.title: Welcome to a 10 minute coding challenge
Write the update() and show() functions
Translate to the middle of the canvas
Start to tweak size and speed of stars

codeExamples.description: Animated visualization of a starfield (2D rendering)
